attributes.action: Grant Chris Brown entry into the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
"An official reported that the UK banned Chris as a safety concern due to his criminal past: We reserve the right to refuse entry to the UK to anyone guilty of a serious criminal offense. Public safety is one of our primary concerns." 

Chris brown is not a threat to the public.
attributes.background: Chris Brown is an American recording artist, dancer and actor. Since the incident with Rihanna he has taken steps to become a stronger, more responsible person, trying to make amends for his past, and promising himself and the watching world never to turn his loved ones into victims again.
